summary: Iteration 36 Testing Complete - All 6 features verified. Tour Guide on guest entry works (modal appears after 2.5s delay), Settings page has REPLAY_TOUR button that triggers tour modal, Briefing page has SFX toggle button, cinematicAudio.js exports verified, AudioContext does NOT import cinematicAudio (scoped to briefing only), Dashboard source filter and search functionality working.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: Tour Guide Modal triggers after guest entry via setTimeout(openTourGuide, 2500) in LandingPage.js
PASS: Tour Guide Modal triggers after login/register via setTimeout(openTourGuide, 2500) in AuthPage.js
PASS: TourGuideModal.js uses custom event 'narvo-open-tour' for external triggering (openTourGuide function)
PASS: Settings page GUIDED_TOUR section with REPLAY_TOUR heading and LAUNCH button (data-testid='replay-tour-btn')
PASS: Clicking LAUNCH button on settings opens tour guide modal successfully
PASS: Briefing page SFX toggle button exists (data-testid='sfx-toggle') in header bar next to NEW button
PASS: SFX toggle is functional - toggles between ON/OFF states with visual feedback
PASS: cinematicAudio.js exports playBriefingIntro, playBriefingOutro, playSectionDivider
PASS: MorningBriefingPage.js imports and uses all three cinematic audio functions
PASS: AudioContext.js does NOT import cinematicAudio (0 matches) - audio effects scoped to briefing only
PASS: Tone.js v15.1.22 loaded (console log verified)
PASS: Dashboard source filter toggle (ALL_SOURCES, RSS_ONLY, AGGREGATORS) working
PASS: Search functionality returns results for query 'Nigeria' (6 results)
PASS: Aggregator APIs showing MEDIASTACK and NEWSDATA articles in telemetry sidebar
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' button on landing page OR set localStorage.setItem('narvo_guest', 'true')
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 36 tested REFINED implementations from P13: (1) Tour Guide triggers on guest entry/login/register after 2.5s delay via custom event 'narvo-open-tour'. (2) Settings page has GUIDED_TOUR section with LAUNCH button (data-testid='replay-tour-btn') to replay tour. (3) Briefing page has SFX toggle (data-testid='sfx-toggle') to enable/disable cinematic audio. (4) cinematicAudio.js exports 3 functions: playBriefingIntro, playBriefingOutro, playSectionDivider. (5) AudioContext.js does NOT import cinematicAudio - effects scoped to briefing only. (6) Dashboard source filter and search working correctly. Note: Google Fact Check API has MOCK fallback when API key not set.

tour_guide_on_guest_entry.notes: Tour modal appears ~2.5s after clicking 'Oya, Play' button, 5 steps with NEXT/PREV/SKIP/CLOSE buttons

tour_guide_replay_on_settings.notes: Settings page has GUIDED_TOUR section with REPLAY_TOUR heading and LAUNCH button that opens tour modal

sfx_toggle_on_briefing.notes: SFX toggle button (data-testid='sfx-toggle') present in briefing header, functional toggle

audio_not_in_audiocontext.notes: AudioContext.js has 0 imports of cinematicAudio - effects scoped to briefing only

regression_dashboard_search.notes: Dashboard source filter working, search returns results for 'Nigeria', aggregator APIs showing articles

mocked_apis.factcheck_service: MOCK fallback when Google Fact Check API key not set

screenshots: .screenshots/iter36_tour_modal.png - Tour Guide Modal step 1/5 on dashboard after guest entry
.screenshots/iter36_tour_from_settings.png - Tour modal opened from settings LAUNCH button
.screenshots/iter36_briefing_sfx.png - Briefing page with SFX toggle button visible
.screenshots/iter36_dashboard.png - Dashboard with source filter and news feed
